```tsx
import {
  DateCell,
  DatePickerMonth,
  DatePickerWeekdays,
  DatePickerProvider,
  DatePicker,
  MonthPicker,
  ScrollingDatePicker,
  TimePickerColumn,
  TimePickerTime,
  TimePicker,
  YearPicker,
} from "@fold-ui/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => {
    const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date());
    const { today, tomorrow } = useMemo(() => {
        const today = new Date();
        const tomorrow = new Date(today.getTime() + 4 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
        return { today, tomorrow };
    }, []);
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState([[today, tomorrow]]);
    const handleSelection = (date) => {
        if (selection.length == 0) {
            setSelection([[date, null]]);
        }
        else {
            const selected = selection[0];
            if (!selected[0])
                return setSelection([date, null]);
            if (!!selected[0] && !!selected[1])
                return setSelection([[date, null]]);
            if (!!selected[0] && !selected[1])
                return setSelection(selected[0] > date ? [[date, selected[0]]] : [[selected[0], date]]);
        }
    };
    return (<Card p={10} width="fit-content">
            <DatePickerProvider>
                <DatePicker height={350} width={300} defaultDate={date} selection={selection} onChange={handleSelection}/>
            </DatePickerProvider>
        </Card>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => {
    const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date())
    const { today, tomorrow } = useMemo(() => {
        const today = new Date()
        const tomorrow = new Date(today.getTime() + 4 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)

        return { today, tomorrow }
    }, [])
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState<any[]>([[today, tomorrow]])

    const handleSelection = (date: Date) => {
        if (selection.length == 0) {
            setSelection([[date, null]])
        } else {
            const selected = selection[0]
            if (!selected[0]) return setSelection([date, null])
            if (!!selected[0] && !!selected[1]) return setSelection([[date, null]])
            if (!!selected[0] && !selected[1])
                return setSelection(selected[0] > date ? [[date, selected[0]]] : [[selected[0], date]])
        }
    }

    return (
        <Card
            p={10}
            width="fit-content">
            <DatePickerProvider>
                <DatePicker
                    height={350}
                    width={300}
                    defaultDate={date}
                    selection={selection}
                    onChange={handleSelection}
                />
            </DatePickerProvider>
        </Card>
    )
}
```
### Select Week

export const SelectWeek = () => {
    const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date());
    const { today, tomorrow } = useMemo(() => {
        const today = new Date();
        const tomorrow = new Date(today.getTime() + 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
        return { today, tomorrow };
    }, []);
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState([]);
    const handleWeekSelection = (dates) => {
        setSelection([...selection, dates]);
    };
    return (<DatePickerProvider>
            <DatePicker selectWeek height={350} width={300} defaultDate={date} selection={selection} onChange={handleWeekSelection}/>
        </DatePickerProvider>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<SelectWeek />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="SelectWeek.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const SelectWeek = () => {
    const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date())
    const { today, tomorrow } = useMemo(() => {
        const today = new Date()
        const tomorrow = new Date(today.getTime() + 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)

        return { today, tomorrow }
    }, [])
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState<any[]>([])

    const handleWeekSelection = (dates: Date[]) => {
        setSelection([...selection, dates])
    }

    return (
        <DatePickerProvider>
            <DatePicker
                selectWeek
                height={350}
                width={300}
                defaultDate={date}
                selection={selection}
                onChange={handleWeekSelection}
            />
        </DatePickerProvider>
    )
}
```
### Month Display

export const MonthDisplay = () => {
    const today = new Date();
    const month = today.getMonth();
    const year = today.getFullYear();
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1);
    const selected = new Date(year, month, 16);
    const disabled = new Date(year, month, 14);
    return (<DatePickerProvider>
            <DatePickerMonth width={300} height={275} date={date} selection={[[selected, selected]]} disabled={[[disabled]]}/>
        </DatePickerProvider>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<MonthDisplay />
</div>

```tsx
export const MonthDisplay = () => {
    const today = new Date()
    const month = today.getMonth()
    const year = today.getFullYear()
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1)
    const selected = new Date(year, month, 16)
    const disabled = new Date(year, month, 14)

    return (
        <DatePickerProvider>
            <DatePickerMonth
                width={300}
                height={275}
                date={date}
                selection={[[selected, selected]]}
                disabled={[[disabled]]}
            />
        </DatePickerProvider>
    )
}
```

### Month And Weekdays

export const MonthAndWeekdays = () => {
    const today = new Date();
    const month = today.getMonth();
    const year = today.getFullYear();
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1);
    const start = new Date(year, month, 16);
    const end = new Date(year, month, 19);
    const disabled = new Date(year, month, 13);
    return (<View width={300}>
            <DatePickerProvider>
                <DatePickerWeekdays width="100%"/>
                <DatePickerMonth width="100%" height={275} date={date} selection={[[start, end]]} disabled={[[disabled]]}/>
            </DatePickerProvider>
        </View>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<MonthAndWeekdays />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="MonthAndWeekdays.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const MonthAndWeekdays = () => {
    const today = new Date()
    const month = today.getMonth()
    const year = today.getFullYear()
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1)
    const start = new Date(year, month, 16)
    const end = new Date(year, month, 19)
    const disabled = new Date(year, month, 13)

    return (
        <View width={300}>
            <DatePickerProvider>
                <DatePickerWeekdays width="100%" />
                <DatePickerMonth
                    width="100%"
                    height={275}
                    date={date}
                    selection={[[start, end]]}
                    disabled={[[disabled]]}
                />
            </DatePickerProvider>
        </View>
    )
}
```
### Month Custom Day Render

export const MonthCustomDayRender = () => {
    const today = new Date();
    const month = today.getMonth();
    const year = today.getFullYear();
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1);
    const start = new Date(year, month, 16);
    const end = new Date(year, month, 19);
    const disabled = new Date(year, month, 13);
    return (<View width={300}>
            <DatePickerProvider>
                <DatePickerWeekdays width="100%"/>
                <DatePickerMonth width="100%" height={275} date={date} selection={[[start, end]]} disabled={[[disabled]]} renderDay={(day) => {
            if (day.getDate() == 11 && day.getMonth() == date.getMonth()) {
                return (<IconLib icon="warning" color="var(--f-color-danger)"/>);
            }
            else if (day.getDate() == 7 && day.getMonth() == date.getMonth()) {
                return (<>
                                    <span>{day.getDate()}</span>
                                    <Badge variant="danger" anchor="top-left" width={7} height={7} style={{ marginLeft: 7, marginTop: 7 }}/>
                                </>);
            }
            else {
                return day.getDate();
            }
        }}/>
            </DatePickerProvider>
        </View>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<MonthCustomDayRender />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="MonthCustomDayRender.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const MonthCustomDayRender = () => {
    const today = new Date()
    const month = today.getMonth()
    const year = today.getFullYear()
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1)
    const start = new Date(year, month, 16)
    const end = new Date(year, month, 19)
    const disabled = new Date(year, month, 13)

    return (
        <View width={300}>
            <DatePickerProvider>
                <DatePickerWeekdays width="100%" />
                <DatePickerMonth
                    width="100%"
                    height={275}
                    date={date}
                    selection={[[start, end]]}
                    disabled={[[disabled]]}
                    renderDay={(day) => {
                        if (day.getDate() == 11 && day.getMonth() == date.getMonth()) {
                            return (
                                <IconLib
                                    icon="warning"
                                    color="var(--f-color-danger)"
                                />
                            )
                        } else if (day.getDate() == 7 && day.getMonth() == date.getMonth()) {
                            return (
                                <>
                                    <span>{day.getDate()}</span>
                                    <Badge
                                        variant="danger"
                                        anchor="top-left"
                                        width={7}
                                        height={7}
                                        style={{ marginLeft: 7, marginTop: 7 }}
                                    />
                                </>
                            )
                        } else {
                            return day.getDate()
                        }
                    }}
                />
            </DatePickerProvider>
        </View>
    )
}
```
### Custom Weekend

export const CustomWeekend = () => {
    const today = new Date();
    const month = today.getMonth();
    const year = today.getFullYear();
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1);
    const start = new Date(year, month, 16);
    const end = new Date(year, month, 20);
    const disabled = new Date(year, month, 13);
    return (<DatePickerProvider>
            <View width={300}>
                <DatePickerWeekdays width="100%"/>
                <DatePickerMonth width="100%" height={275} date={date} selection={[[start, end]]} disabled={[[disabled]]} weekendDays={[0, 5]}/>
            </View>
        </DatePickerProvider>);
};

<CustomWeekend />
</div>

```tsx
export const CustomWeekend = () => {
    const today = new Date()
    const month = today.getMonth()
    const year = today.getFullYear()
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1)
    const start = new Date(year, month, 16)
    const end = new Date(year, month, 20)
    const disabled = new Date(year, month, 13)

    return (
        <DatePickerProvider>
            <View width={300}>
                <DatePickerWeekdays width="100%" />
                <DatePickerMonth
                    width="100%"
                    height={275}
                    date={date}
                    selection={[[start, end]]}
                    disabled={[[disabled]]}
                    weekendDays={[0, 5]}
                />
            </View>
        </DatePickerProvider>
    )
}
```

### Months Display

export const MonthsDisplay = () => {
    const today = new Date();
    const month = today.getMonth();
    const year = today.getFullYear();
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1);
    const selectedStart = new Date(year, month, 16);
    const selectedEnd = new Date(year, month + 3, 16);
    const disabled = new Date(year, month + 7, 14);
    return (<DatePickerProvider>
            <MonthPicker width={300} height={220} date={date} selection={[[selectedStart, selectedEnd]]} disabled={[[disabled]]}/>
        </DatePickerProvider>);
};

```tsx
    const today = new Date()
    const month = today.getMonth()
    const year = today.getFullYear()
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1)
    const selectedStart = new Date(year, month, 16)
    const selectedEnd = new Date(year, month + 3, 16)
    const disabled = new Date(year, month + 7, 14)

    return (
        <DatePickerProvider>
            <MonthPicker
                width={300}
                height={220}
```

### Years Display

export const YearsDisplay = () => {
    const today = new Date();
    const month = today.getMonth();
    const year = today.getFullYear();
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1);
    const selectedStart = new Date(year - 1, month, 16);
    const selectedEnd = new Date(year + 1, month, 16);
    const disabled = new Date(year + 4, month, 14);
    return (<DatePickerProvider>
            <YearPicker width={300} height={220} date={date} selection={[[selectedStart, selectedEnd]]} disabled={[[disabled]]}/>
        </DatePickerProvider>);
};

```tsx
    const today = new Date()
    const month = today.getMonth()
    const year = today.getFullYear()
    const date = new Date(year, month, 1)
    const selectedStart = new Date(year - 1, month, 16)
    const selectedEnd = new Date(year + 1, month, 16)
    const disabled = new Date(year + 4, month, 14)

    return (
        <DatePickerProvider>
            <YearPicker
                width={300}
                height={220}
                date={date}
                selection={[[selectedStart, selectedEnd]]}
                disabled={[[disabled]]}
            />
        </DatePickerProvider>
    )
}
```

        <DateCell weekend>19</DateCell>
        <DateCell pending>8</DateCell>
        <DateCell today>31</DateCell>
        <DateCell disabled>June</DateCell>
        <DateCell selected>2023</DateCell>
        <DateCell unavailable>2022</DateCell>

### Multiple Months

export const MultipleMonths = () => {
    const date = new Date();
    const { today, tomorrow, disabled1, disabled2 } = useMemo(() => {
        const today = new Date();
        const tomorrow = new Date(today.getTime() + 5 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
        const disabled1 = new Date(today.getTime() - 6 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
        const disabled2 = new Date(today.getTime() - 3 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
        return {
            today,
            tomorrow,
            disabled1,
            disabled2,
        };
    }, []);
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState([[today, tomorrow]]);
    const handleSelection = (date) => {
        if (selection.length == 0) {
            setSelection([[date, null]]);
        }
        else {
            const selected = selection[0];
            if (!selected[0])
                return setSelection([date, null]);
            if (!!selected[0] && !!selected[1])
                return setSelection([[date, null]]);
            if (!!selected[0] && !selected[1])
                return setSelection(selected[0] > date ? [[date, selected[0]]] : [[selected[0], date]]);
        }
    };
    return (<DatePickerProvider>
            <Stack direction="vertical" spacing={20}>
                <Card p={10} width="fit-content">
                    <DatePicker defaultDate={date} selection={selection} onChange={handleSelection} disabled={[[disabled1, disabled2]]} height={350} width={300}/>
                </Card>

                <Card p={10} width="fit-content">
                    <DatePicker defaultDate={date} selection={selection} onChange={handleSelection} width={600} height={350} disabled={[[disabled1, disabled2]]} panels={2}/>
                </Card>

                <Card p={10} width="fit-content">
                    <DatePicker defaultDate={date} selection={selection} onChange={handleSelection} disabled={[[disabled1, disabled2]]} width={900} height={350} panels={3}/>
                </Card>
            </Stack>
        </DatePickerProvider>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<MultipleMonths />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="MultipleMonths.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const MultipleMonths = () => {
    const date = new Date()
    const { today, tomorrow, disabled1, disabled2 } = useMemo(() => {
        const today = new Date()
        const tomorrow = new Date(today.getTime() + 5 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
        const disabled1 = new Date(today.getTime() - 6 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
        const disabled2 = new Date(today.getTime() - 3 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
        return {
            today,
            tomorrow,
            disabled1,
            disabled2,
        }
    }, [])
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState<any[]>([[today, tomorrow]])

    const handleSelection = (date: Date) => {
        if (selection.length == 0) {
            setSelection([[date, null]])
        } else {
            const selected = selection[0]
            if (!selected[0]) return setSelection([date, null])
            if (!!selected[0] && !!selected[1]) return setSelection([[date, null]])
            if (!!selected[0] && !selected[1])
                return setSelection(selected[0] > date ? [[date, selected[0]]] : [[selected[0], date]])
        }
    }

    return (
        <DatePickerProvider>
            <Stack
                direction="vertical"
                spacing={20}>
                <Card
                    p={10}
                    width="fit-content">
                    <DatePicker
                        defaultDate={date}
                        selection={selection}
                        onChange={handleSelection}
                        disabled={[[disabled1, disabled2]]}
                        height={350}
                        width={300}
                    />
                </Card>

                <Card
                    p={10}
                    width="fit-content">
                    <DatePicker
                        defaultDate={date}
                        selection={selection}
                        onChange={handleSelection}
                        width={600}
                        height={350}
                        disabled={[[disabled1, disabled2]]}
                        panels={2}
                    />
                </Card>

                <Card
                    p={10}
                    width="fit-content">
                    <DatePicker
                        defaultDate={date}
                        selection={selection}
                        onChange={handleSelection}
                        disabled={[[disabled1, disabled2]]}
                        width={900}
                        height={350}
                        panels={3}
                    />
                </Card>
            </Stack>
        </DatePickerProvider>
    )
}
```
### Date Inputs

export const DateInputs = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('');
    const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date());
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState([]);
    const dateModal = useVisibility(false);
    const timeModal = useVisibility(false);
    const getTimeFormat = (date) => {
        const hours = date.getHours();
        const minutes = date.getMinutes();
        const seconds = date.getSeconds();
        return `${pad(hours)}:${pad(minutes)}:${pad(seconds)}`;
    };
    const getDateFormat = (date) => {
        const day = date.getDate();
        const month = date.getMonth() + 1;
        const year = date.getFullYear();
        return `${pad(year)}-${pad(month)}-${pad(day)}`;
    };
    const handleSelection = (ndate) => {
        setSelection([[ndate, ndate]]);
        const d = new Date(date);
        d.setFullYear(ndate.getFullYear());
        d.setMonth(ndate.getMonth());
        d.setDate(ndate.getDate());
        setDate(new Date(d));
        dateModal.hide();
    };
    return (<DatePickerProvider>
            <Stack direction="horizontal" spacing={10}>
                <InputPopover content={<View p={20}>
                            <DatePicker defaultDate={new Date()} selection={selection} onChange={handleSelection} width="100%" height={350} monthProps={{ flex: 1 }}/>
                        </View>}>
                    <InputControl>
                        <Input onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)} placeholder="Type here - datetimelocal" value={getDateFormat(date)} type="date"/>
                        <InputSuffix>
                            <IconLib icon="date" style={{ pointerEvents: 'none' }}/>
                        </InputSuffix>
                    </InputControl>
                </InputPopover>

                <InputPopover content={<View p={20}>
                            <TimePicker width="100%" height={350} date={date} onChange={(date) => setDate(date)}/>
                        </View>}>
                    <InputControl>
                        <Input onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)} placeholder="Type here - datetimelocal" value={getTimeFormat(date)} type="time"/>
                        <InputSuffix>
                            <IconLib icon="time" style={{ pointerEvents: 'none' }}/>
                        </InputSuffix>
                    </InputControl>
                </InputPopover>
            </Stack>
        </DatePickerProvider>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<DateInputs />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="DateInputs.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const DateInputs = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState<any>('')
    const [date, setDate] = useState<Date>(new Date())
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState<any[]>([])
    const dateModal = useVisibility(false)
    const timeModal = useVisibility(false)

    const getTimeFormat = (date: Date) => {
        const hours = date.getHours()
        const minutes = date.getMinutes()
        const seconds = date.getSeconds()
        return `${pad(hours)}:${pad(minutes)}:${pad(seconds)}`
    }

    const getDateFormat = (date) => {
        const day = date.getDate()
        const month = date.getMonth() + 1
        const year = date.getFullYear()
        return `${pad(year)}-${pad(month)}-${pad(day)}`
    }

    const handleSelection = (ndate: Date) => {
        setSelection([[ndate, ndate]])
        const d = new Date(date)
        d.setFullYear(ndate.getFullYear())
        d.setMonth(ndate.getMonth())
        d.setDate(ndate.getDate())
        setDate(new Date(d))
        dateModal.hide()
    }

    return (
        <DatePickerProvider>
            <Stack
                direction="horizontal"
                spacing={10}>
                <InputPopover
                    content={
                        <View p={20}>
                            <DatePicker
                                defaultDate={new Date()}
                                selection={selection}
                                onChange={handleSelection}
                                width="100%"
                                height={350}
                                monthProps={{ flex: 1 }}
                            />
                        </View>
                    }>
                    <InputControl>
                        <Input
                            onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
                            placeholder="Type here - datetimelocal"
                            value={getDateFormat(date)}
                            type="date"
                        />
                        <InputSuffix>
                            <IconLib
                                icon="date"
                                style={{ pointerEvents: 'none' }}
                            />
                        </InputSuffix>
                    </InputControl>
                </InputPopover>

                <InputPopover
                    content={
                        <View p={20}>
                            <TimePicker
                                width="100%"
                                height={350}
                                date={date}
                                onChange={(date) => setDate(date)}
                            />
                        </View>
                    }>
                    <InputControl>
                        <Input
                            onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
                            placeholder="Type here - datetimelocal"
                            value={getTimeFormat(date)}
                            type="time"
                        />
                        <InputSuffix>
                            <IconLib
                                icon="time"
                                style={{ pointerEvents: 'none' }}
                            />
                        </InputSuffix>
                    </InputControl>
                </InputPopover>
            </Stack>
        </DatePickerProvider>
    )
}
```
### Scrolling Picker

export const ScrollingPicker = () => {
    const { goToToday } = useScrollingDatePicker();
    const ref = useRef(null);
    const monthNames = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'];
    const { today, tomorrow, start, end } = useMemo(() => {
        const today = new Date();
        const tomorrow = new Date(today.getTime() + 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
        const start = new Date(today.getTime() + 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
        const end = new Date(today.getTime() + 6 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
        return {
            today,
            tomorrow,
            start,
            end,
        };
    }, []);
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState([[start, end]]);
    const handleSelection = (date) => {
        if (selection.length == 0) {
            setSelection([[date, null]]);
        }
        else {
            const selected = selection[0];
            if (!selected[0])
                return setSelection([date, null]);
            if (!!selected[0] && !!selected[1])
                return setSelection([[date, null]]);
            if (!!selected[0] && !selected[1])
                return setSelection(selected[0] > date ? [[date, selected[0]]] : [[selected[0], date]]);
        }
    };
    const handleTodayClick = (e) => {
        goToToday(ref.current);
    };
    return (<View width={300}>
            <DatePickerProvider>
                <Button onClick={handleTodayClick}>Go to Today</Button>
                <ScrollingDatePicker height={300} ref={ref} defaultDate={today} selection={selection} onChange={handleSelection} monthTitle={(date) => (<Text p="1rem" as="span" width="100%">
                            {monthNames[date.getMonth()]} / {date.getFullYear()}
                        </Text>)}/>
            </DatePickerProvider>
        </View>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<ScrollingPicker />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="ScrollingPicker.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const ScrollingPicker = () => {
    const { goToToday } = useScrollingDatePicker()
    const ref = useRef(null)
    const monthNames = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec']
    const { today, tomorrow, start, end } = useMemo(() => {
        const today = new Date()
        const tomorrow = new Date(today.getTime() + 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
        const start = new Date(today.getTime() + 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
        const end = new Date(today.getTime() + 6 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
        return {
            today,
            tomorrow,
            start,
            end,
        }
    }, [])
    const [selection, setSelection] = useState<any[]>([[start, end]])

    const handleSelection = (date: Date) => {
        if (selection.length == 0) {
            setSelection([[date, null]])
        } else {
            const selected = selection[0]
            if (!selected[0]) return setSelection([date, null])
            if (!!selected[0] && !!selected[1]) return setSelection([[date, null]])
            if (!!selected[0] && !selected[1])
                return setSelection(selected[0] > date ? [[date, selected[0]]] : [[selected[0], date]])
        }
    }

    const handleTodayClick = (e) => {
        goToToday(ref.current)
    }

    return (
        <View width={300}>
            <DatePickerProvider>
                <Button onClick={handleTodayClick}>Go to Today</Button>
                <ScrollingDatePicker
                    height={300}
                    ref={ref}
                    defaultDate={today}
                    selection={selection}
                    onChange={handleSelection}
                    monthTitle={(date: Date) => (
                        <Text
                            p="1rem"
                            as="span"
                            width="100%">
                            {monthNames[date.getMonth()]} / {date.getFullYear()}
                        </Text>
                    )}
                />
            </DatePickerProvider>
        </View>
    )
}
```
### Time

export const Time = () => {
    const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date('2024-06-20 10:15:25'));
    return (<View row gap="1rem" justifyContent="flex-start">
            <View>
                <Heading as="h3" lineHeight={2}>
                    12 hours
                </Heading>
                <TimePicker twelveHours width={250} height={250} date={date} onChange={setDate}/>
            </View>
            <View>
                <Heading as="h3" lineHeight={2}>
                    24 hours
                </Heading>
                <TimePicker showAmPm={false} width={200} height={250} date={date} onChange={setDate}/>
            </View>
        </View>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Time />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Time.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Time = () => {
    const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date('2024-06-20 10:15:25'))

    return (
        <View
            row
            gap="1rem"
            justifyContent="flex-start">
            <View>
                <Heading
                    as="h3"
                    lineHeight={2}>
                    12 hours
                </Heading>
                <TimePicker
                    twelveHours
                    width={250}
                    height={250}
                    date={date}
                    onChange={setDate}
                />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Heading
                    as="h3"
                    lineHeight={2}>
                    24 hours
                </Heading>
                <TimePicker
                    showAmPm={false}
                    width={200}
                    height={250}
                    date={date}
                    onChange={setDate}
                />
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
